remarks: Span in the set of functionals with closed kernels.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdlsp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdlsp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlsp.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcdlsp.m $e |- M = ( LSpan ` D ) $.
lcdlsp.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdlsp.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
lcdlsp.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
lcdlsp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdlsp.g $e |- ( ph -> G C_ F ) $.
lcdlsp $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` G ) = ( M ` G ) ) $.
